content: in the weeds is a charted pattern with 9 colors the corrugated ribbing is done on size 2 needles then you switch to size 3 needles for the rest of the hat knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn ash 30 yds bark 36 yds clover 30 yds caper 25 yds lichen 5 yds mist 25 yds cream 15 yds green tea heather 20 yds spearmint 20 yds
